entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h this morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning after midnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon.
